xuv_3xo_features.text: [{'url': 'https://www.autocarindia.com/auto-features/mahindra-xuv-3xo-price-variants-features-explained-431425', 'content': "Mahindra XUV 3XO price, variants, features explained | Autocar India All All Price News Reviews Features Specifications Images Videos All All Price News Reviews Features Specifications Images Videos Signup Login Find a Car Cars Compare Cars New Cars Upcoming Cars Car Price Car Loan Calculator Find a Bike Bikes Compare Bikes New New Bikes New Scooters Upcoming Upcoming Bikes Upcoming Scooters Electric Electric Bikes Electric Scooters Bike Price Bike Loan Calculator News Cars Bikes Motorsports Industry Marketplace Reviews Car First drive / Reviews Comparisons Video reviews Long-term reviews Bike First ride / Reviews Comparisons Video reviews Long-term reviews Features Features Travelogues Blogs Interviews Partner Content Galleries Videos Images Stories Advice Signup Login Change City Close Detect my Current Location Pick from Popular Cities Mumbai Bengaluru Delhi Pune Hyderabad Ahmedabad Chennai Kolkata Home Features Mahindra XUV 3XO price, variants, features explained Mahindra XUV 3XO price, variants, features explained The XUV 3XO recently added new RevX variants, which are offered with two turbo-petrol engine options. Published On Jul 10, 2025 04:21:00 PM 1,05,258 Views Follow us on By Saptarshi Mondal Share - The Mahindra XUV 3XO , formerly XUV300, was launched last year with all-new front and rear designs, a refreshed interior and more features, as well as new powertrain options. Currently priced from Rs 7.99 lakh to Rs 15.79 lakh, ex-showroom India, this Mahindra SUV is available in a total of 12 trim levels (see table below). In this feature, we take a closer look at what features and engine options you get with each trim. Mahindra XUV 3XO petrol variant prices (in Rs, lakh) Petrol-MT Petrol-AT Diesel-MT Diesel-AMT MX1 7.99 - - - RevX M 8.94 - - - RevX M(O) 9.44 - - - MX2 - - 9.99 - MX2 Pro 9.54 10.54 10.64 - MX3 9.74 11.40 10.99 11.79 MX3 Pro 9.99 11.69 11.56 - AX5 11.19 12.69 12.19 12.99 RevX A T-GDI 11.79 12.99 - - AX5L T-GDI 12.62 13.94 - - AX7 T-GDI 12.80 13.99 13.69 14.70 AX7L T-GDI 13.99 15.80 14.99 - Mahindra XUV 3XO variant-wise powertrains The XUV 3XO's engine options include a 111hp, 200Nm, 1.2-litre turbo-petrol engine, 131hp, 230Nm, 1.2-litre TGDI engine and 117hp, 300Nm, and 1.5-litre diesel engine.A 6-speed manual gearbox is standard with these engines.Also, both petrol engines get a 6-speed torque converter automatic gearbox, while the diesel XUV 3XO models come with a 6-speed AMT unit. The 111hp turbo-petrol engine is available on the MX1, RevX M, RevX M(O), MX2, MX2 Pro, MX3, MX3 Pro and the AX5 trims. Moving on, the 131hp turbo-petrol engine is available only on the top four trims - RevX A, AX5 L, AX7 and AX7 L. The diesel engine is available nearly across the board, starting from the fourth-from-base MX2 trim. Here's a look at the variant split of the new XUV 3XO. Mahindra XUV 3XO variant-wise features XUV 3XO MX1 Price: Rs 7.99 lakh; powertrain - 111hp turbo petrol-MT Halogen projector headlamps LED daytime running lamps LED indicator on wing mirrors, LED tail lamps 6 airbags Electronic Stability Control (ESC) 16-inch steel wheels Electrically adjustable wing mirrors Engine start/stop Front armrest with storage 60:40 split rear seat Rear AC vents Adjustable headrest for second row Seat belt reminder for all passengers 3-point seat belt for all passengers XUV 3XO RevX M Price: Rs 8.94 lakh; powertrain - 111hp turbo petrol-MT Features over MX1 Dual-tone roof Body-coloured grille Wheel covers Black Leatherette Seats 10.25-inch touchscreen 4 speakers Steering-mounted audio controls Remote keyless entry Mahindra XUV 3XO RevX M(O) Price: Rs 9.44 lakh; powertrain - 111hp turbo petrol-MT Features over RevX M Single-pane sunroof Mahindra XUV 3XO MX2 Price: Rs 9.99 lakh; engine options - 117hp diesel-MT Features over MX1 10.25-inch touchscreen 4 speakers Steering-mounted controls Remote keyless entry Mahindra XUV 3XO MX2 Pro Price: Rs 9.54 lakh-10.64 lakh; powertrains - 111hp turbo petrol-MT/AT; diesel-MT Featu", 'images': [{'url': 'https://img.autocarindia.com/Features/Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants.jpg?w=700&c=1', 'alt_text': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO red colour', 'title': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO price, variants, features explained', 'class': 'img-fluid ne-lis-img', 'confidence': 0.7999999999999999}, {'url': 'https://img.autocarindia.com/model/uploads/modelimages/Mahindra-XUV-3XO-290420241902.jpg', 'alt_text': 'Latest Image of Mahindra XUV 3XO', 'title': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO', 'class': 'img-fluid wid-img', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7999999999999999}, {'url': 'https://img.autocarindia.com/Galleries/20250708042739_Mahindra_XUV_3XO_REVX_Front_Static.jpg?w=234&h=156&q=90&c=1', 'alt_text': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO RevX image gallery', 'class': 'img-fluid', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7999999999999999}, {'url': 'https://img.autocarindia.com/ExtraImages/20241119094249_Mahindra_XUV_3XO_video_review.jpg?w=234&h=156&q=90&c=1', 'alt_text': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO AX5 video review', 'class': 'img-fluid', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7999999999999999}, {'url': 'https://img.autocarindia.com/Videos/skodavsmahindra.jpg?w=234&h=156&q=90&c=1', 'alt_text': 'Skoda Kylaq vs Mahindra XUV 3XO comparison video', 'class': 'img-fluid', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7}], 'rank': 1}, {'url': 'https://auto.mahindra.com/suv/xuv3xo/X3XO.html', 'content': "Mahindra XUV 3XO - 'height': '175', 'class': 'imageTransition', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7999999999999999}], 'rank': 4}, {'url': 'https://wheelmarvel.com/mahindra-xuv-3xo-features-mileage-safety-engine/', 'content': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO: Features, Interior, Mileage, Safety Engine - Wheel Marvel Skip to content Menu Home Sedan Hatchback Compact SUV SUV EV Cars Whats new About us Privacy Policy Disclaimer Mahindra XUV 3XO: features, interior, mileage, safety engine April 25, 2024 April 18, 2024 by Content Team Mahindra is set to redefine the compact SUV segment with the upcoming launch of its much-anticipated Mahindra XUV 3XO which is Scheduled for release on April 29, 2024, this new model brings a host of segment-first features and substantial upgrades over its predecessor, the XUV300 . With a focus on innovation, Mahindra aims to elevate the driving experience and offer a compelling option for those seeking performance and style in a compact package. Table of Contents Inside the XUV 3XO How Fast is the XUV 3XO? How Fuel-Efficient is the XUV 3XO? Cool Tech Features in the XUV 3XO Safety Features in the XUV 3XO Engine Choices for the XUV 3XO When will the XUV 3XO Launch? Heres a breakdown of Mahindra XUV 3XO key features: Inside the XUV 3XO The inside of the XUV 3XO looks a bit like the new Mahindra XUV400 electric car. It has a big touchscreen in the middle of the dashboard, a new steering wheel, and a fancy digital display for the speedometer and other gauges. How Fast is the XUV 3XO? Mahindra hasnt said exactly how fast all the engine choices will be, but they did say one version can go from 0 to 60 kilometers per hour in just 4.5 seconds! Thats really fast. How Fuel-Efficient is the XUV 3XO? Mahindra 3XO Mileage/ Source Mah indra Rise Mahindra says that one version of the XUV 3XO should get 20.1 kilometers per liter of fuel. That means you wont have to stop for gas as often. Cool Tech Features in the XUV 3XO The XUV 3XO is expected to have some features you wont find in other small SUVs. This includes a big sunroof that opens all the way up, separate controls for the air conditioning in the front and back seats, and Apple CarPlay and Android Auto that connect wirelessly to your phone. There are also expected to be features like ventilated seats to keep you cool, a wireless phone charger, and a camera system that can see all around the car to help you park. Safety Features in the XUV 3XO Mahindra hasnt said exactly which safety features will come standard in the XUV 3XO, but they are expected to include airbags, disc brakes on all four wheels, and a system that helps you control the car if you start to skid. There may also be blind spot warning and other features to help keep you safe on the road. Engine Choices for the XUV 3XO The XUV 3XO is expected to come with the same engine choices as the XUV300. There will be a 1.5 liter turbo diesel engine, a 1.2 liter turbo petrol engine, and a sportier version of the 1.2 liter engine. You will be able to choose between a manual transmission or an automatic transmission. When will the XUV 3XO Launch? Mahindra XUV 3XO rear view The Mahindra XUV 3XO is going to be shown to the world for the first time on April 29, 2024. It will compete with other small SUVs like the Maruti Suzuki Brezza, Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue, and Kia Sonet. Heres a breakdown of Mahindra XUV 3XO key features: Panoramic Sunroof: Mahindra XUV 3XO will be the first in its segment to offer a panoramic sunroof, following the trend of larger sunroofs for a more open and airy feel. Enhanced Connectivity: The new Adrenox Connect app allows for remote control of the XUV 3XOs AC system, along with potential future features like infotainment control, door lock/unlock, and vehicle diagnostics. This replaces the BlueSense app used previously. Dual 10.25-Inch Screens: Similar to the XUV400 EV, the 3XO gets a dual-screen setup with a 10.25-inch digital driver display and a 10.25-inch infotainment touchscreen. ADAS (Possible): While not confirmed yet, the 3XO might come equipped with ADAS (Advanced Driver-Assistance Systems) technology, putting it on par with competitors like the Hyundai Venue and Kia Sonet in terms of safety features. nodes.description: Retrieve details of the features for Mahindra XUV 3XO from the web.
nodes.agent_prompt: Fetch and consolidate details regarding the features of the Mahindra XUV 3XO vehicle from reputable automotive news websites, Mahindra's official website, and other relevant sources. Focus on gathering information about engine specifications, safety features, technology, interior and exterior design elements, and any unique selling points. Return all gathered results.

Published On Jul 10, 2025 04:21:00 PM 1,05,258 Views Follow us on By Saptarshi Mondal Share - The Mahindra XUV 3XO , formerly XUV300, was launched last year with all-new front and rear designs, a refreshed interior and more features, as well as new powertrain options. Currently priced from Rs 7.99 lakh to Rs 15.79 lakh, ex-showroom India, this Mahindra SUV is available in a total of 12 trim levels (see table below). In this feature, we take a closer look at what features and engine options you get with each trim. The 111hp turbo-petrol engine is available on the MX1, RevX M, RevX M(O), MX2, MX2 Pro, MX3, MX3 Pro and the AX5 trims. Moving on, the 131hp turbo-petrol engine is available only on the top four trims - RevX A, AX5 L, AX7 and AX7 L. The diesel engine is available nearly across the board, starting from the fourth-from-base MX2 trim. Here's a look at the variant split of the new XUV 3XO. 'height': '175', 'class': 'imageTransition', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7999999999999999}], 'rank': 4}, {'url': 'https://wheelmarvel.com/mahindra-xuv-3xo-features-mileage-safety-engine/', 'content': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO: Features, Interior, Mileage, Safety Engine - Wheel Marvel Skip to content Menu Home Sedan Hatchback Compact SUV SUV EV Cars Whats new About us Privacy Policy Disclaimer Mahindra XUV 3XO: features, interior, mileage, safety engine April 25, 2024 April 18, 2024 by Content Team Mahindra is set to redefine the compact SUV segment with the upcoming launch of its much-anticipated Mahindra XUV 3XO which is Scheduled for release on April 29, 2024, this new model brings a host of segment-first features and substantial upgrades over its predecessor, the XUV300 . With a focus on innovation, Mahindra aims to elevate the driving experience and offer a compelling option for those seeking performance and style in a compact package. Table of Contents Inside the XUV 3XO How Fast is the XUV 3XO? How Fuel-Efficient is the XUV 3XO? Cool Tech Features in the XUV 3XO Safety Features in the XUV 3XO Engine Choices for the XUV 3XO When will the XUV 3XO Launch? Heres a breakdown of Mahindra XUV 3XO key features: Inside the XUV 3XO The inside of the XUV 3XO looks a bit like the new Mahindra XUV400 electric car. It has a big touchscreen in the middle of the dashboard, a new steering wheel, and a fancy digital display for the speedometer and other gauges. How Fast is the XUV 3XO? Mahindra hasnt said exactly how fast all the engine choices will be, but they did say one version can go from 0 to 60 kilometers per hour in just 4.5 seconds! Thats really fast. How Fuel-Efficient is the XUV 3XO? Mahindra 3XO Mileage/ Source Mah indra Rise Mahindra says that one version of the XUV 3XO should get 20.1 kilometers per liter of fuel. That means you wont have to stop for gas as often. Cool Tech Features in the XUV 3XO The XUV 3XO is expected to have some features you wont find in other small SUVs. This includes a big sunroof that opens all the way up, separate controls for the air conditioning in the front and back seats, and Apple CarPlay and Android Auto that connect wirelessly to your phone. There are also expected to be features like ventilated seats to keep you cool, a wireless phone charger, and a camera system that can see all around the car to help you park. Safety Features in the XUV 3XO Mahindra hasnt said exactly which safety features will come standard in the XUV 3XO, but they are expected to include airbags, disc brakes on all four wheels, and a system that helps you control the car if you start to skid. There may also be blind spot warning and other features to help keep you safe on the road. Engine Choices for the XUV 3XO The XUV 3XO is expected to come with the same engine choices as the XUV300. There will be a 1.5 liter turbo diesel engine, a 1.2 liter turbo petrol engine, and a sportier version of the 1.2 liter engine. You will be able to choose between a manual transmission or an automatic transmission. When will the XUV 3XO Launch? Mahindra XUV 3XO rear view The Mahindra XUV 3XO is going to be shown to the world for the first time on April 29, 2024. It will compete with other small SUVs like the Maruti Suzuki Brezza, Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue, and Kia Sonet. Heres a breakdown of Mahindra XUV 3XO key features: Panoramic Sunroof: Mahindra XUV 3XO will be the first in its segment to offer a panoramic sunroof, following the trend of larger sunroofs for a more open and airy feel. Enhanced Connectivity: The new Adrenox Connect app allows for remote control of the XUV 3XOs AC system, along with potential future features like infotainment control, door lock/unlock, and vehicle diagnostics. This replaces the BlueSense app used previously. Dual 10.25-Inch Screens: Similar to the XUV400 EV, the 3XO gets a dual-screen setup with a 10.25-inch digital driver display and a 10.25-inch infotainment touchscreen. ADAS (Possible): While not confirmed yet, the 3XO might come equipped with ADAS (Advanced Driver-Assistance Systems) technology, putting it on par with competitors like the Hyundai Venue and Kia Sonet in terms of safety features. nodes.description: Format the fetched details into a comprehensive and readable report about the features of the Mahindra XUV 3XO.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the information gathered about the features of Mahindra XUV 3XO in the previous step, create a detailed report in HTML format. The report should include sections on engine specifications, safety features, technology, interior and exterior design, and any unique selling points. Organize the information in a structured and easy-to-understand manner, and incorporate appropriate headings, subheadings, bullet points, and tables for better readability. The report should be suitable for presentation to a client.
